## Plugin.registerEditorSuggest() method

Register an EditorSuggest which can provide live suggestions while the user is typing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerEditorSuggest(editorSuggest: EditorSuggest<any>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>editorSuggest</code> | [`EditorSuggest`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/EditorSuggest.md)<code>&lt;any&gt;</code> |  |

**Returns:**

`void`
